title: Shiba Inu leader urges community to support BONE token for Binance listing
description: The leader of the Shiba Inu community, known as Shytoshi Kusama, has issued a rallying call to the global Shiba Inu army, urging them to throw their support behind the Bone ShibaSwap (BONE) token in its bid for a potential listing on the Binance Futures platform.  This move comes as Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency […]

title: Uncovering Language Bias: AI Models Implicated in Covert Racism Study
description: a pre-print study from Cornell University has unveiled concerning revelations of the presence of language bias in large language models (LLMs). These deep learning algorithms, including OpenAI’s ChatGPT and GPT-4, Meta’s LLaMA2, and French Mistral 7B, have been found to exhibit covert racism in their responses.  Navigating language bias in AI The study, led by […]

title: Goldman Sachs upgrades Coinbase to Neutral amid bitcoin surge
description: Goldman Sachs recently adjusted its evaluation of Coinbase (COIN), elevating its rating to neutral from a previous sell stance. This revision followed a notable surge in Bitcoin’s value, reaching new heights, alongside a remarkable increase in daily trading volumes on the exchange, levels not observed since 2021.  Additionally, Goldman Sachs raised its price target for […]

title: Worldcoin’s Price Surges Amid OpenAI Board Changes
description: In a significant development for the cryptocurrency market, Worldcoin (WLD) has experienced a remarkable surge, reaching an all-time high and surpassing the $10 mark. This surge, approximately 46%, is attributed to pivotal changes within the OpenAI organization, as announced by Worldcoin’s co-founder and OpenAI CEO, Sam Altman. OpenAI welcomes new board members Sam Altman recently […]

title: AI Threatening Music Creativity? Renowned Writer Raises Alarm
description: Renowned British songwriter Guy Chambers, known for his collaboration with artists like Robbie Williams and Kylie Minogue, has expressed deep concerns over the increasing use of artificial intelligence (AI) in the music industry. Chambers, whose co-writing credits include the iconic hit “Angels,” warned against the potential threat AI poses to replace human songwriters. AI’s impact […]

title: Whales hold steady amidst Bitcoin surge
description: Bitcoin addresses with substantial holdings continue to climb despite the cryptocurrency reaching new heights, surpassing the $70,000 mark for the first time. The latest on-chain data reveals a significant increase in unique addresses holding at least 1,000 Bitcoin, commonly called “whales.” Whale numbers surge The number of addresses holding a minimum of 1,000 Bitcoin has […]

title: Digital assets are rising again, but is the bull run here to stay? | Opinion
description: While all bull runs come to an end—make no mistake about that—-what makes the recent bull market complex is the multitude of factors influencing it, such as power, trust, and accessibility.

title: Pundit Says Ripple Selling XRP and Repurchasing It Is Not Manipulation
description:
The debate around Ripple’s XRP sales and its impact on XRP’s market value has remained a heated topic in the crypto community. Allegations of deliberate price manipulation by Ripple reached a new height recently following the disclosure of how Ripple leveraged various bots services to orchestrate its routine XRP sales.  However, some commentators, such as […]

title: Analyst Nicholas Merten Says XRP Competitor Could Go Up by 200%, Updates Outlook on Aave, Compound and Uniswap
description:
Widely followed analyst Nicholas Merten is offering his forecast on four crypto assets amid an industry-wide market rally. Starting with payments-focused blockchain network Stellar (XLM), Merten tells the 510,000 YouTube subscribers of the DataDash channel that the XRP rival is sitting at a “typical discount range”. According to Merten, XLM could appreciate by around 200% […]
